name: Atgar Laser Cannon
Lore: 'Atgar 1.4 FD P-tower anti-vehicle cannon. Adapted to operate with minimal performance loss in the extremes of a cold environment.',
Text: 'Deploy on an exterior planet site. Your warrior present may target a vehicle at same or adjacent site using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target crashes if destiny +2 > armor. Target hit if destiny +1 > maneuver.',
